settings.text:
At this time of year orders take around 4 weeks to ship out after they are placed. When your order ships out from the nursery, you will receive an email with your tracking information from UPS..

We ship our plants all year, so if you would like your order to be shipped at a different time of year please let us know the month you would like your order to ship out in the ‘Order Notes’ section at the end of the checkout process.
